sys_ux_client_script.name: Fetch catalog item details

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_50c1c285d6653110d1cbe65476ee4893
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Additional details">d8c1c285af653110f825d92948bcbd92</macroponent><name>Fetch catalog item details</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : "",
  "message" : "No additional details at this time.",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
async function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var data = api.data.look_up_records_1.results;
    var finalOutput = [];
    data.forEach(function(element) {
        if (element.sc_item_option._reference.value.displayValue) {
            finalOutput.push({
                'label': element.sc_item_option._reference.item_option_new.displayValue,
                'value': {
                    'type': 'string',
                    'value': element.sc_item_option._reference.value.displayValue
                }
            });
        }
    });
    if (finalOutput != "") {
        api.setState('labelValue', finalOutput);
    } else {
        var emptylabel = await helpers.translate("No additional details at this time.");
        var emptyvalue = "";
        finalOutput.push({
            'label': emptylabel,
            'value': {
                'type': 'string',
                'value': emptyvalue
            }
        });
        api.setState('labelValue', finalOutput);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-26 09:51:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>50c1c285d6653110d1cbe65476ee4893</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fetch catalog item details</sys_name><sys_package display_value="LOS POC" source="x_1070677_los_po_0">7a4dccfc4761311077acc7de826d43c1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="LOS POC">7a4dccfc4761311077acc7de826d43c1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_50c1c285d6653110d1cbe65476ee4893</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-26 09:51:37</sys_updated_on><target/><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
